description: Dashboard ClickHouse para monitoramento completo de instâncias e clusters ClickHouse na plataforma INNOVABIZ

targets.expr: rate(clickhouse_query_time_ms_sum{tenant_id=~"$tenant_id", region_id=~"$region_id", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval]) / rate(clickhouse_query_time_ms_count{tenant_id=~"$tenant_id", region_id=~"$region_id", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])

avg by(tenant_id, region_id, environment, instance) (rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{mode!="idle", tenant_id=~"$tenant_id", region_id=~"$region_id", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"}[$__rate_interval])) * 100

node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{tenant_id=~"$tenant_id", region_id=~"$region_id", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"} - node_memory_MemFree_bytes{tenant_id=~"$tenant_id", region_id=~"$region_id", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"} - node_memory_Cached_bytes{tenant_id=~"$tenant_id", region_id=~"$region_id", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"} - node_memory_Buffers_bytes{tenant_id=~"$tenant_id", region_id=~"$region_id", environment=~"$environment", instance=~"$instance"}

title: INNOVABIZ - ClickHouse Dashboard
